Gap Description: No documentation on CI/CD integrations such as GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, or other pipeline tools for automated feedback loops.

Suggested Title: Enterprise Security Setup: SSO & Whitelisting Configuration

Gap Description: Limited coverage of webhooks and advanced API automation use‑cases; no reference for event‑driven workflows or custom integrations.
